cast.name: 史蒂夫·卡拉汉 Steve Callahan

introduction: From acclaimed indie film maker Paul Bright (Angora Ranch, Altitude Falling) comes a tale of modern day romance, drama and survival.Denis arrives a bit late for work on Monday morning and like so many of us, out of the blue he is laid off.Not knowing where to go or what to do he finds himself sitting on a park bench dreaming of a better life. His relationship is at a low, he is jobless and his mother is ill. It is left to a stray dog to make him open his eyes and change his life.Dogs become his life and by saving them he learns to save himself.
